name: Shadow of the Wyrm
summary: Shadow of the Wyrm is a single player, traditional roguelike. You play a shipwrecked adventurer, washed up on the shore of an island far from home. Recently monsters have returned to the world, and there are whispers about something ancient waking in the far north-west, a being of ruinous intelligence, a creature of fire and flame. A cold wind blows; there is chaos on the air.
